segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me about any income you have, like, uh, sources or anything? Just, you know, stuff you're getting from work or other things?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I guess my main income is from my job. I, uh, make about three thousand dollars a month, I think? It's, like, at a, um, graphic design firm. So that's my main thing, right now.

segments.advisor_message: Okay, cool! So that's definitely helpful. Is that amount gross or net, like after taxes or before? Also, any idea on how long you'll keep getting that?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, that's gross, I guess. And I, uh, plan on staying there at least until, like, 2025, if everything goes well, you know? It’s a fun job.
